analysis.description:
VestingTrustee.grant (/unique_chucks/1/0x818fc6c2ec5986bc6e2cbf00939d90556ab12ce5.sol#323-362) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(grants[_to].value == 0)

VestingTrustee.grant (/unique_chucks/1/0x818fc6c2ec5986bc6e2cbf00939d90556ab12ce5.sol#323-362) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(grants[_to].value == 0)
VestingTrustee.unlockVestedTokens (/unique_chucks/1/0x818fc6c2ec5986bc6e2cbf00939d90556ab12ce5.sol#428-460) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- vested == 0
	- transferable == 0

VestingTrustee.grant (/unique_chucks/1/0x818fc6c2ec5986bc6e2cbf00939d90556ab12ce5.sol#323-362) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(grants[_to].value == 0)
VestingTrustee.unlockVestedTokens (/unique_chucks/1/0x818fc6c2ec5986bc6e2cbf00939d90556ab12ce5.sol#428-460) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- vested == 0
	- transferable == 0
VestingTrustee.vestedTokens (/unique_chucks/1/0x818fc6c2ec5986bc6e2cbf00939d90556ab12ce5.sol#390-393) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- grant.value == 0

Reentrancy in VestingTrustee.grant (/unique_chucks/1/0x818fc6c2ec5986bc6e2cbf00939d90556ab12ce5.sol#323-362):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(totalVesting.add(_value) <= kin.balanceOf(address(this))) (/unique_chucks/1/0x818fc6c2ec5986bc6e2cbf00939d90556ab12ce5.sol#345-348)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- grants (/unique_chucks/1/0x818fc6c2ec5986bc6e2cbf00939d90556ab12ce5.sol#348-356)
	- totalVesting (/unique_chucks/1/0x818fc6c2ec5986bc6e2cbf00939d90556ab12ce5.sol#359-360)

Reentrancy in KinTokenSale.grantTokens (/unique_chucks/1/0x818fc6c2ec5986bc6e2cbf00939d90556ab12ce5.sol#702-736):
	External calls:
	- issueTokens(grantee,tokensIssued) (/unique_chucks/1/0x818fc6c2ec5986bc6e2cbf00939d90556ab12ce5.sol#723)
	- issueTokens(trustee,tokensVesting) (/unique_chucks/1/0x818fc6c2ec5986bc6e2cbf00939d90556ab12ce5.sol#727-730)
	- trustee.grant(grantee,tokensVesting,now.add(tokenGrant.startOffset),now.add(tokenGrant.cliffOffset),now.add(tokenGrant.endOffset),tokenGrant.installmentLength,true) (/unique_chucks/1/0x818fc6c2ec5986bc6e2cbf00939d90556ab12ce5.sol#730-734)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lastGrantedIndex (/unique_chucks/1/0x818fc6c2ec5986bc6e2cbf00939d90556ab12ce5.sol#736)

BasicToken.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/1/0x818fc6c2ec5986bc6e2cbf00939d90556ab12ce5.sol#120-122) shadows:
	- ERC20.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/1/0x818fc6c2ec5986bc6e2cbf00939d90556ab12ce5.sol#103-104)

VestingTrustee.revoke (/unique_chucks/1/0x818fc6c2ec5986bc6e2cbf00939d90556ab12ce5.sol#366-379) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-kin.transfer(msg.sender,refund) (/unique_chucks/1/0x818fc6c2ec5986bc6e2cbf00939d90556ab12ce5.sol#378-379)

VestingTrustee.unlockVestedTokens (/unique_chucks/1/0x818fc6c2ec5986bc6e2cbf00939d90556ab12ce5.sol#428-460) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-kin.transfer(msg.sender,transferable) (/unique_chucks/1/0x818fc6c2ec5986bc6e2cbf00939d90556ab12ce5.sol#456-458)

VestingTrustee.revoke.grant (local variable @ /unique_chucks/1/0x818fc6c2ec5986bc6e2cbf00939d90556ab12ce5.sol#368) shadows:
	- VestingTrustee.grant (function @ /unique_chucks/1/0x818fc6c2ec5986bc6e2cbf00939d90556ab12ce5.sol#323-362)

VestingTrustee.vestedTokens.grant (local variable @ /unique_chucks/1/0x818fc6c2ec5986bc6e2cbf00939d90556ab12ce5.sol#391) shadows:
	- VestingTrustee.grant (function @ /unique_chucks/1/0x818fc6c2ec5986bc6e2cbf00939d90556ab12ce5.sol#323-362)

VestingTrustee.unlockVestedTokens.grant (local variable @ /unique_chucks/1/0x818fc6c2ec5986bc6e2cbf00939d90556ab12ce5.sol#429) shadows:
	- VestingTrustee.grant (function @ /unique_chucks/1/0x818fc6c2ec5986bc6e2cbf00939d90556ab12ce5.sol#323-362)

KinTokenSale.grantTokens has external calls inside a loop:
	- trustee.grant(grantee,tokensVesting,now.add(tokenGrant.startOffset),now.add(tokenGrant.cliffOffset),now.add(tokenGrant.endOffset),tokenGrant.installmentLength,true) (/unique_chucks/1/0x818fc6c2ec5986bc6e2cbf00939d90556ab12ce5.sol#730-734)
ERC20.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/1/0x818fc6c2ec5986bc6e2cbf00939d90556ab12ce5.sol#103-104)
ERC20.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/1/0x818fc6c2ec5986bc6e2cbf00939d90556ab12ce5.sol#104-105) should be declared external
BasicToken.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/1/0x818fc6c2ec5986bc6e2cbf00939d90556ab12ce5.sol#157-159) should be declared external

BasicToken.allowance (/unique_chucks/1/0x818fc6c2ec5986bc6e2cbf00939d90556ab12ce5.sol#150-152) should be declared external
TokenHolder.transferAnyERC20Token (/unique_chucks/1/0x818fc6c2ec5986bc6e2cbf00939d90556ab12ce5.sol#199-204) should be declared external
VestingTrustee.revoke (/unique_chucks/1/0x818fc6c2ec5986bc6e2cbf00939d90556ab12ce5.sol#366-379) should be declared external
